text: tavada ‘allāh pahaḷa karana mema (dharmaya) anugamanaya karanu’ yayi ovunṭa kiyanu læbuvahot (ovun) “esē nova, kumak mata apagē mutun mittan (siṭimin, ovun kumak karamin) siṭinu api duṭuvemuda, eyama api anugamanaya karannemu” yayi pavasannāha. ovungē mutun mittan kisivak nodannā aya vaśayenda, ṛju mārgaya at nokara gat aya vaśayenda siṭiyat vuvada, (ovunva anugamanaya karannehuda)
